mappings.name: Natural Language Understanding
mappings.justification: Core requirement for interpreting clinical queries and patient notes

mappings.name: Knowledge Retrieval
mappings.justification: Fundamental for accessing patient records from Epic EMR

mappings.name: Data Integration
mappings.justification: Required for FHIR API integration with Epic and CDS systems

mappings.name: Summarization
mappings.justification: Core function: generating concise patient summaries

mappings.name: Tool Integration
mappings.justification: Must integrate with Epic APIs and clinical systems

mappings.name: Workflow Orchestration
mappings.justification: Coordinates multi-step information retrieval and presentation

mappings.name: Human-in-the-Loop
mappings.justification: Critical for healthcare: all outputs require clinician review

mappings.name: Access Control
mappings.justification: HIPAA requirement: role-based access aligned with Epic permissions

mappings.name: Context Fusion
mappings.justification: Enhances relevance by combining patient context with query intent

mappings.name: Reasoning & Analysis
mappings.justification: Supports intelligent prioritization of clinical information

mappings.name: Causal Analysis
mappings.justification: Helps identify relationships between conditions and treatments

mappings.name: Response Generation
mappings.justification: Produces well-formatted clinical summaries and explanations

mappings.name: Explanation
mappings.justification: Provides transparency on information sources and confidence

mappings.name: Audit & Logging
mappings.justification: HIPAA compliance requirement for all data access

mappings.name: Continuous Learning
mappings.justification: Future enhancement: learn from clinician feedback patterns

mappings.name: Personalization
mappings.justification: Future: adapt presentation to individual clinician preferences

mappings.name: Collaboration
mappings.justification: Future: support multi-clinician workflows and handoffs

mappings.name: Transparency
mappings.justification: Enhanced: detailed provenance and confidence scoring

full_document:
## Capability Mapping Assessment

### Agent Type: T2 (Procedural Workflow)
### Total Capabilities Mapped: 18

---

### Essential Capabilities (8)
These are must-have capabilities for MVP:

| ID | Name | Justification |
|----|------|---------------|
| PK.NL | Natural Language Understanding | Core requirement for interpreting clinical queries |
| PK.KR | Knowledge Retrieval | Fundamental for accessing patient records |
| PK.DI | Data Integration | Required for FHIR API integration |
| CG.SU | Summarization | Core function: generating patient summaries |
| AE.TI | Tool Integration | Must integrate with Epic APIs |
| AE.WO | Workflow Orchestration | Coordinates multi-step retrieval |
| IC.HI | Human-in-the-Loop | Critical for healthcare safety |
| GS.AC | Access Control | HIPAA compliance requirement |

### Advanced Capabilities (6)
Should-have for production readiness:

| ID | Name | Justification |
|----|------|---------------|
| PK.CF | Context Fusion | Enhances relevance |
| CG.RA | Reasoning & Analysis | Intelligent prioritization |
| CG.CA | Causal Analysis | Identify clinical relationships |
| AE.RE | Response Generation | Well-formatted outputs |
| IC.EX | Explanation | Source transparency |
| GS.AU | Audit & Logging | HIPAA compliance |

### Optional Capabilities (4)
Nice-to-have for future versions:

| ID | Name | Justification |
|----|------|---------------|
| LA.CL | Continuous Learning | Learn from feedback |
| LA.PL | Personalization | Adapt to clinician preferences |
| IC.CO | Collaboration | Multi-clinician workflows |
| GS.TR | Transparency | Enhanced provenance |
